= Message window =

When clicking on a message, jPOCSAG displays the details of the frames:

http://jpocsag.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/message_window.png

Blocks that contain errors are in blue or red. Blocks in blue _appear_ to have been corrected successfully. Blocks in red were not correctable.
